body: $PQEFF Several people have asked for my opinion of Petroteq's packet. I think the two-page statement at the front
created_at: followed by the multiple page FAQ that follows
column3: makes it clear that Petroteq believes that not only is Viston Offer lacking on multiple fronts
column4: but the Petroteq board has full confidence that the offer is lowballed. They talk about the review process that is now going on
column5: in cooperation with Haywood. My impression is they have their hands full exploring every other possible option that makes sense. The document is laid out fairly well
column6: and they expect to contact shareholders with more information in the near future. (See attached two images in the comments of this post.)
